entries.title: US military shoots down Chinese balloon over coastal waters
entries.description: Once the object was over the ocean, US jets moved in.

entries.title: The physics of James Joyce’s Ulysses
entries.description: The 101-year-old novel shows that "physics and literature are not mutually exclusive."

entries.title: Scientific highs and lows of cannabinoids
entries.description: Hundreds of cannabis-related chemicals now exist, inspiring researchers—and users.

entries.title: Scientists grew mini human guts inside mice
entries.description: Tiny organoids with working immune systems mimic the function of the GI tract.

entries.title: My latest co-op multiplayer obsession is Raft, the game where you build a raft
entries.description: Raft is a watery, more-focused riff on some of Minecraft's ideas.
